entries.title: Statistics - Oesterreichische Nationalbank (OeNB)
entries.text: The OeNB is committed to providing a broad range of current statistics in user-friendly formats to the public and has established a statistics hotline.

entries.title: Monetary policy - Oesterreichische Nationalbank (OeNB)
entries.text: The Eurosystem's monetary policy strategy provides the framework for monetary policy decisions. These build on two interdependent analyses.

entries.title: How monetary policy works - Oesterreichische Nationalbank
entries.text: The process by which monetary policy decisions are transmitted to the real economy is called the monetary policy transmission mechanism.

entries.title: Monetary policy implementation
entries.text: Monetary policy serves to steer money market interest rates with the aim of safeguarding price stability.
